name: Bop Design
overview:
Bop Design is a marketing communications firm that partners with small business. The firm focuses on lead generation through branding, advertising, print design, web design, SEO and SEM.

Bop Design understands that in order to grow a business, a holistic approach is required. Good design, SEO, SEM and social media are all valuable lead generation tools, but they need to be combined into a highly focused, cohesive strategy that targets a desired market.

For small businesses, finding the right marketing partner can be a tricky prospect. Larger, traditional advertising agencies may do great work, but won’t work with you unless you have an extravagant marketing budget. Freelancers who claim to be a â€œjack of all tradesâ€ are usually a â€œmaster of none.â€

That’s where Bop Design comes in. We believe that every business, regardless of its size, deserves cost-effective design and comprehensive marketing solutions. We work specifically with small businesses, usually ones with fewer than 100 employees, that are serious about growing.
